spotify.title: Spotify-Inspired Music Streaming App
spotify.description: A Spotify-inspired music streaming application developed using Next.js, Next auth and Supabase, offering an immersive and personalized music listening experience.
spotify.purpose: The Spotify-like music streaming app was built to deliver an enjoyable and personalized music streaming experience. Leveraging Supabase as the backend, the aim was to create a platform where users can add their own mp3 files, and organize their favorite music seamlessly.
features: User Authentication: Secure authentication using Next Auth to provide personalized music recommendations and playlists.
Music Catalog: A vast and diverse music catalog, allowing users to explore and discover their preferred tracks and artists.
Personalized Playlists: Create and manage custom playlists based on music preferences and mood.
Seamless Playback: Smooth and uninterrupted music playback with a user-friendly and intuitive audio player.
Search and Recommendations: Efficient search functionality and personalized music recommendations based on listening history and preferences.
Responsive Design: Optimized for various devices, ensuring a consistent and enjoyable listening experience across platforms.
Real-time Updates: Utilizes Firebase for real-time updates of playlists and user interactions for an interactive experience.
Social Sharing: Share favorite tracks and playlists with friends through social media integration.
spotify.audience: This application is tailored for music enthusiasts and avid listeners who appreciate a curated and personalized music streaming experience. It is designed for individuals who enjoy discovering new music and organizing their favorite tracks seamlessly.
